ca.concordia.lanterns.exchange.impl

Class WorstExchange

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.concordia.lanterns.exchange.impl.WorstExchange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ExchangeBehavior

    public class WorstExchange
extends java.lang.Object
implements ExchangeBehavior
    Provides services for making an exchange that is unfavourable to one or more Player of the Game.
    Author:
    par_pat

    • Constructor Detail

      • WorstExchange

        public WorstExchange()

    • Method Detail

      • makeExchange

        public void makeExchange(Game game,
                         Player currentPlayer)
        Makes an exchange on behalf of currentPlayer such that it is unfavourable to one or more players of the game. The rules of the exchange are as follows:

        • Starting with the player with next turn and moving clockwise attempt to stop atleast one player from making a dedication by emptying the supply of lantern card they would require to make the dedication.

        • The attempt to stop dedications is made in decreasing order of the dedication value earned if the dedication could not be stopped
        • If it is impossible to stop any player from making a dedication then decrease the supply of the least available lantern card.
        Specified by:
        makeExchange in interface ExchangeBehavior
